message:
These instant apps, produced by an array of small startups and major companies including McDonalds and Apple-backed Didi Chuxing, bypass Apple’s App Store entirely. Accessible only within WeChat, they look and feel like apps, but they can be discarded as easily and quickly as a chat.

Facebook is behind another big threat to Apple: chatbots
story: Mohamed Elsherif shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: China’s biggest messaging app is on a collision course with Apple
caption: techinasia.com
description: With its newest feature, WeChat wants you never to download or install another app.
